analysis.input_vector: Captain ordered 'Debug and Auto-Tune' before West Internal Test.
analysis.output_vector: Found friction in Audio Envelope (clicks) and Text Rendering (constant speed). Tuned Audio to remove artifacts. Tuned Text to match Entropy Speed.
analysis.key_insight: A slow thought should not appear instantly. A fast thought should not wait. The interface time must match the logic time.

crystallization_result.axiom_injected: Flow Dynamics: The interface is a liquid, not a solid.
